verses.verse: The burden<WH4853> of Moab.<WH4124> Because<WH3588> in the night<WH3915> Ar<WH6144> of Moab<WH4124> is laid waste,<WH7703> and brought to silence;<WH1820> because<WH3588> in the night<WH3915> Kir<WH7024> of Moab<WH4124> is laid waste,<WH7703> and brought to silence;<WH1820>

He is gone up<WH5927> to Bajith,<WH1006> and to Dibon,<WH1769> the high places,<WH1116> to weep:<WH1065> Moab<WH4124> shall howl<WH3213> over<WH5921> Nebo,<WH5015> and over<WH5921> Medeba:<WH4311> on all<WH3605> their heads<WH7218> shall be baldness,<WH7144> and every<WH3605> beard<WH2206> cut off.<WH1639>

In their streets<WH2351> they shall gird<WH2296> themselves with sackcloth:<WH8242> on<WH5921> the tops of their houses,<WH1406> and in their streets,<WH7339> every one<WH3605> shall howl,<WH3213> weeping<WH1065> abundantly.<WH3381>

And Heshbon<WH2809> shall cry,<WH2199> and Elealeh:<WH500> their voice<WH6963> shall be heard<WH8085> even unto<WH5704> Jahaz:<WH3096> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> the armed soldiers<WH2502> of Moab<WH4124> shall cry out;<WH7321> his life<WH5315> shall be grievous<WH3415> unto him.

My heart<WH3820> shall cry<WH2199> out for Moab;<WH4124> his fugitives<WH1280> shall flee unto<WH5704> Zoar,<WH6820> a heifer<WH5697> of three years old:<WH7992> for<WH3588> by the mounting up<WH4608> of Luhith<WH3872> with weeping<WH1065> shall they go it up;<WH5927> for<WH3588> in the way<WH1870> of Horonaim<WH2773> they shall raise up<WH5782> a cry<WH2201> of destruction.<WH7667>

For <WH3588> the waters<WH4325> of Nimrim<WH5249> shall be<WH1961> desolate:<WH4923> for<WH3588> the hay<WH2682> is withered away,<WH3001> the grass<WH1877> faileth,<WH3615> there is<WH1961> no<WH3808> green thing.<WH3418>

Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> the abundance<WH3502> they have gotten,<WH6213> and that which they have laid up,<WH6486> shall they carry away<WH5375> to<WH5921> the brook<WH5158> of the willows.<WH6155>

For <WH3588> the cry<WH2201> is gone round<WH5362> about<WH853> the borders<WH1366> of Moab;<WH4124> the howling<WH3213> thereof unto<WH5704> Eglaim,<WH97> and the howling<WH3213> thereof unto Beer-elim.<WH879>

For <WH3588> the waters<WH4325> of Dimon<WH1775> shall be full<WH4390> of blood:<WH1818> for<WH3588> I will bring<WH7896> more<WH3254> upon<WH5921> Dimon,<WH1775> lions<WH738> upon him that escapeth<WH6413> of Moab,<WH4124> and upon the remnant<WH7611> of the land.<WH127>
